name: Lekrkoekj Dash
description:
Move your cube from side to side to avoid hitting the obstacles in your way.

There are 7 worlds to play in:
Basic, Forest, Minecraft, Mario, Roblox, Wopke, Tetris

Complete Quests to get coins:
There are 16 Quests in total!

Endless levels:
Are the premade 7 worlds not enough for you? There are also randomly generated endless levels! You can choose between 3 different difficulties.

The shop:
In the shop you can buy powerups, like jumping, for your cube. There are also colors/skins available for your cube and extra worlds for you to play in. You can earn coins by playing levels and completing Quests.

I know this game and the controls are terrible, but this is my first ever game I've made so please don't judge too hard.
